H0.text: Which town is the administrative headquarters of Northumberland. Alnwick

H1.text: Which town is the administrative headquarters of Northumberland. Hexham

H2.text: Which town is the administrative headquarters of Northumberland. Berwick-upon-Tweed

H3.text: Which town is the administrative headquarters of Northumberland. MORPETH

A4.text: The upper tier of local government is Northumberland County Council, which meets at County Hall in Morpeth.
